TopicTitle: i cant open the "load" tab in the VAB

Articles.Content: the "load" lab in only the VAB wont open, on steam i just re-installed kerbal space program BUT STILL i cant open the "load" tab in the VAB only. i can open it in the spaceplane hanger and i'm not sure why. please help!

Hi @TheNarwhalArmy, it is likely you have a corrupt craft file in the ships/vab folder for that game.

Try removing one craft file at a time from the folder until the load button works again, when it does the last file moved will be the corrupted one.
